text: Attila Ling (born 26 November 1962) is a Hungarian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Hungary Category:Equestrians at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:People from Nyíregyháza
title: Attila Ling
